column5: Spacious, Panoramic Lake View Home; Newly Furnished. Three Bedroom, Three and a Half Baths, Huge Gathering Patio With Gas Grill and Plenty of Elbow Room (Approximately 3000 Sq Ft of Inside Space). Close To All Area Amenities. Pet Friendly, with a Screened/Enclosed Porch with a Doggie Door to Gated Area.
column8: Panoramic Lake View Home Away From Home
